clickHere: Click here to enable the extension
downloadResourcesDirectory: Sync resources with the server - Project: {{projectName}}
downloadResourcesDirectoryNoResources: Not resources to sync from the server
downloadResourcesDirectoryError: Error syncing project resources: {{error}} for project id: {{projectId}}
downloadResourcesDirectoryErrorProjectId: Error syncing project resources for project id: {{projectId}}, file name: {{fileName}}
downloadResourcesDirectorySuccess: Project resources successfully synced for project id: {{projectId}}
downloadResourcesDirectoryNotSelected: No folder selected to save the file
errorReadingResource: Error reading the selected directory or file
